meta_info: ::id NW_PRI_ENG_0153_2000_1214.5 ::date 2017-11-06T05:33:23 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Pope was flown to the U.S. military base at Ramstein, Germany. # ::save-date Thu Nov 9, 2017 ::file NW_PRI_ENG_0153_2000_1214_5.txt

sentence: He will spend the next several days at the medical center there before he returns home with his wife Sherry.

meta_info: ::id NW_PRI_ENG_0153_2000_1214.7 ::date 2017-11-06T05:42:19 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Pope was in remission from a rare form of bone cancer when he was arrested in Russia. # ::save-date Wed Dec 6, 2017 ::file NW_PRI_ENG_0153_2000_1214_7.txt
sentence: Pope was in remission from a rare form of bone cancer when he was arrested in Russia.

meta_info: ::id NW_PRI_ENG_0153_2000_1214.8 ::date 2017-11-06T05:47:16 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Doctors will examine him for signs that the cancer may have come back while he awaiting trial in a Russian jail. # ::save-date Wed Dec 6, 2017 ::file NW_PRI_ENG_0153_2000_1214_8.txt
sentence: Doctors will examine him for signs that the cancer may have come back while he awaiting trial in a Russian jail.
